document.webtitle: ConnectToCatering.com - Online Dining Birmingham, Catering Birmingham, Catering Montgomery
document.description: Order will be sent to caterer and you will receive a confirmation email. Caterer will be in touch via email or phone to confirm order and obtain payment information.
document.body:
Welcome to ConnectToCatering.com!
Catering in Birmingham and Montgomery AL has never been easier or more delicious for in or out of the office with ConnectToCatering.com . With one click, you can connect to the best variety of Birmingham and Montgomery catering menus and the easiest, most convenient online catering ordering.
Our Alabama caterers offer group catering for office lunches (boxed lunches), wedding catering, tailgating catering or private party catering .
* Fast - one click away from 30+ Alabama catering menus from local restaurants and caterers in Birmingham&Montgomery, offering a variety of catering options for any occasion, big or small. Receive email confirmations of your catering order for a worry-free, easy process.
* Easy - as a ConnectToCatering.com member (free registration online), you can view multiple categorized menus from experienced and professional Birmingham and Montgomery caterers and restaurants, easily copy previous orders and finish with one click.
* Convenient - place your Birmingham and/or Montgomery catering orders anytime of the day or night, place as many orders as far in advance as you'd like. Delivered straight to your door in many Birmingham and Montgomery areas.
Here’s how to connect to easy catering……..
1. Register - Click the“Register Now”icon to register as a member for free by providing general (not payment) information that is securely stored for quick ordering. Open the confirmation email that will be sent to you (check spam folder) and click on the link to confirm your registration.
2. Search - Use the City search function on the left to search for catering menus in your desired area and click on the partners’logos to view their menus. Delivery areas, fees, payment options, etc. will be listed at the top of the page.
3. Order - Scroll through the categorized menu and select the quantity of items desired. Use the automated special instructions tab to give the caterer any additional important information. Hit‘continue’at the bottom.
4. Confirm - On the next page see the‘items ordered’summary (fixed delivery charges will appear; varied delivery fees will be given by caterer when they contact customer to confirm order) and delivery/pick up information. Any special instructions for caterer can be included in the box.
5. Submit - Hit submit. Order will be sent to caterer and you will receive a confirmation email. Caterer will be in touch via email or phone to confirm order and obtain payment information.
6. Helpful hints - Once an account has been established, you have th e option to copy previous orders. Edit, submit and complete in a few minutes. Also, check out our FAQs page for the most current list of specials, promotions and new menu items.
If you have a question or you are a caterer interested in joining our site, email support@ConnectToCatering.com .
Click here
for current
Birmingham catering
specials and
promotions for May.
